| Person | Location | Whether the Person has lived in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |

* Pedatzur is stated to work for the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, which implies that they have lived or are currently living in the location of the institution, which is Cambridge, Massachusetts.
* The paragraph does not provide any information about Pedatzur's past residences or current residence, other than their work location. Therefore, there is an unknown location where Pedatzur may have lived, which is represented in the table as "Unknown (implied)".
